articles.author: Beth Mole
articles.title: US measles cases reach 5-year high; 15 states report cases, Texas outbreak grows - Ars Technica
articles.description: Since 2000, when measles was eliminated from US, only three years had higher cases.

articles.author: Scharon Harding
articles.title: Everything you say to your Echo will be sent to Amazon starting on March 28 - Ars Technica
articles.description: Amazon is killing a privacy feature to bolster Alexa+, the new subscription assistant.

articles.author: Aisha Malik
articles.title: Google is replacing Google Assistant with Gemini - TechCrunch
articles.description: Google will replace Google Assistant on Android phones with Gemini later this year, the company announced on Friday.
articles.content:
Google will replace Google Assistant on Android phones with Gemini later this year, the company announced on Friday.
